local_intent: Lower until contact on red_plate, verify contact, open gripper to release, retreat to standoff, and wait briefly.
assumptions: End effector is positioned above the red_plate pre-standoff (MoveAbove already executed).
White plate is held in the gripper from prior Pick and IsGraspStable/ObjectInGripper checks.
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'place' phase replacement for LowerUntilContact from GLOBAL_BT: it retries lowering until contact, verifies contact via ContactDetected, then opens the gripper to release, retreats, and waits to satisfy GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION stepwise_plan and termination criteria.
